short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides Form-Fill SSO capabilities when used with Identity Automation’s RapidIdentity product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace security with Identity Automation’s RapidIdentity, the industry’s most complete IAM platform.  RapidIdentity offers full lifecycle management for both internal users (employees, contractors) and external users (partners, vendors, and customers). With RapidIdentity SSO, enable users to securely access all cloud, local and remote Windows applications with a single set of credentials, reducing password fatigue and help desk call volumes. Step up your security with RapidIdentity MFA, Privileged Access Management, and Continuous Access Certification to ensure only authorized users are accessing your company’s sensitive systems and data.   

This Chrome extension enables form-fill logins for non-SAML and OAuth cloud applications.
